articles.description: Footage of a bearded Craig Gordon grinning with satisfaction is now ubiquitous online. It is perhaps the enduring image from the previous Scottish Cup semi-final between Hearts and Hibs.

articles.title: Stefan Savic's Man City career fell apart in TWO WEEKS... he'd been waiting 10 years for his revenge - Daily Mail
articles.description: Stefan Savic has always been an enigma - and Wednesday showed the Atletico Madrid defender's dark side in all of its shame. It doesn't take a genius to realise that Savic had extra incentive.

articles.title: 'Ashamed' Barcelona president announces ticket policy change after Frankfurt fans flood Camp Nou - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Barcelona's president says the club will change its ticket policy for European games after around 30,000 Frankfurt fans gained entry to Camp Nou.

articles.description: For 12-year-old Dmytro Keda, after the worst few weeks imaginable, Thursday evening was a dream come true.
articles.content:
